channel.title: git on Fishy Data
channel.description: Recent content in git on Fishy Data

item.title: Pushing like a dream with git alias
item.description: For years I have staged, committed and pushed via the RStudio Git interface. It works! But it can be time-consuming when you are doing it a lot. And it’s not very dreamy. And I’ve been trying to use my mouse less. It would be better to do this in the terminal. I found this solution on stackoverflow, which suggests staging and committing all files by running the following in the terminal.

item.title: Test
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
